articles.title: U.S. Forces' Presence in S. Korea Can Never Be Justified: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Presence in S. Korea Can Never Be Justified: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation can never tolerate the U.S. desperately  pursuing its hostile policy towards the DPRK while justifying its aggressor forces' presence in south Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 It says:
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' presence in south Korea is the root cause of disturbing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia, and a flagrant violation of the sovereignty of the Korean nation as it is quite contrary to its will and wishes.
					
					 From a historical point of view, the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea was a product of its hostile policy of aggression towards the DPRK, not according to the will and wishes of the Korean nation.
					
					 U.S. troops occupied the region south of the 38th Parallel under the pretext of "disarming Japanese troops" after the Japanese imperialists' defeat. But it was aimed to lay a military springboard from which to put the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia under control. This was quite contrary to the interests of the Koreans.
					
					 The U.S. troops' presence brought untold misfortune and sufferings to the south Korean people. Not a single day passes without seeing tears and blood of people in south Korea where U.S. aggressor troops behave like brutes.
					
					 The U.S. is making foolish efforts to establish military domination over the Asia-Pacific region, though it is suffering serious economic difficulties. However, gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could perpetrate military intervention and invasion of other countries as it pleased, styling itself "the world's only superpower". The U.S. decline and ruin are a hard reality.
					
					 The U.S. forces should pull out of south Korea without fail for the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region and for the U.S. itself.
					
					 If the U.S. persistently tries to perpetuate its military presence in south Korea, this will only result in the miserable doom of its aggressor forces.

articles.title: Undying Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung in Leading Songun Revolution
articles.content:
Undying Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung in Leading Songun Revolution
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Today the army and people of the DPRK are greeting the significant Day of Songun at a historic period when they are winning victory after victory in the all-out confrontation with the U.S. and the struggle to defend socialism and strikingly demonstrating the might of the great Paektusan nation under the guidance of the great Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The glorious history of the Songun revolution records the undying leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung who taught the immutable truth that the independence of the country and nation and victory of the revolution are guaranteed by the arms of the revolution and gave an origin to the Songun revolution.
					
					 He was the pioneer of the great revolutionary cause of Songun and the great leader who provided the ever-victorious traditions of the Korean revolution by dint of Songun.
					
					 He founded the great Songun idea of attaching importance to arms and military affairs, clearly indicating the way of hewing out the independent destiny of the nation and thoroughly applying the idea to the whole course of the revolutionary struggle.
					
					 He founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, the first revolutionary armed forces of Juche type on April 25, Juche 21 (1932), a historic event to be specially recorded in hewing out the destiny of the Korean nation and leading the Songun revolution.
					
					 By relying on the armed forces of Songun, he defeated the brigandish Japanese imperialists and accomplished the historic cause of national liberation. He also beat down the U.S. imperialists and wrought undying military miracles to be specially recorded in the history of the revolutionary wars against imperialism and the history of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 His farsighted wisdom and outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership serve as the basic source which helped our revolutionary armed forces play a decisive role as the most powerful political and military forces in the whole course of the Korean revolution.
					
					 He trained the army not only as forces for waging the anti-imperialist struggle and winning power but also as hardcore forces pushing forward the overall revolution and construction, and laid an eternal foundation for developing it.
					
					 He built the modern defense industry, put all the people under arms and turned the whole country into a fortress, converting it into an invulnerable one self-reliant in defence. This was his great patriotic feat.
					
					 His revolutionary history is, indeed, the glorious history in which he led the revolution and construction to victory by dint of matchless military muscle and the sacred history in which he established the great traditions of the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The tradition of the Juche revolution and the Songun revolution is given a steady continuity in the unprecedented arduous ordeals and the army and people of the DPRK are demonstrating the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea on the highest level as we see today. This would be unthinkable apart from the undying patriotic feats of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 All feats performed by the army and people of the DPRK in the bloody struggle and the road to win such glorious victory are associated with his august name.
					
					 The undying feats Kim Il Sung performed by ushering in the new era of the ever-victorious Songun revolution for the first time in history will remain shining forever.

articles.title: Undying Feats Performed by Kim Jong Il for Protecting National Sovereignty and Dignity
articles.content:
Undying Feats Performed by Kim Jong Il for Protecting National Sovereignty and Dignity 
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- 54 years have passed since leader Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 He visited Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on August 25, Juche 49 (1960). This was a historic event which declared the succession to the Songun revolutionary cause and fresh start of the Songun leadership. 
					
					 His history of revolutionary leadership represents a heroic and epic one of the great Songun brilliant commander who firmly protected the country, nation and socialism, holding aloft the banner of Songun. 
					
					 In the course of providing unprecedented Songun leadership, he formulated and systematized the Songun revolutionary idea and developed it in depth, providing the Korean and other revolutionary people in the world with guidelines to be held fast to in carrying out the cause of independence and the banner for winning one victory after another. 
					
					 He set up the state machinery with main emphasis on national defence and developed the government of the DPRK into a powerful political weapon for enforcing the Songun politics in all fields. 
					
					 He channeled all efforts into bolstering up the military power and developed the KPA into the perfect army of the leader and the party. 
					
					 He built a self-supporting and modern defence industry with an unimaginably great decision and established the trait of attaching importance to military affairs and carried out the work for putting all the people under arms and turning the whole country into a fortress at a new level, thereby converting the whole country into an impregnable fortress. 
					
					 He led the nuclear stand-off with the U.S. and the struggle for defending socialism to victory, thus protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation with his energetic Songun revolutionary leadership. He honorably defended socialism of Juche and achieved a shining victory under the uplifted banner of Songun when the army and people of the DPRK were standing at the crossroads of whether they become an independent people, independent guards and victors or they will become colonial slaves of the imperialists again. 
					
					 By providing his Songun revolutionary leadership, he firmly defended the sovereignty of the nation and laid a foundation for winning a victory in the cause of national reunification. 
					
					 Thanks to the powerful Songun army of the DPRK all attempts of the warmongers at home and abroad to ignite a new war on the Korean peninsula have been shattered and peace of the country and security of the nation are firmly ensured. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il pursued the invincible Songun politics, foiling the evermore undisguised moves of the imperialists to isolate and stifle the DPRK and firmly protecting the destiny of the country and nation. 
					
					 He achieved one victory after another in the confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialism and turned the DPRK into a world-class military power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state which no enemy dares to provoke. 
					
					 Peace and security have been firmly protected on the Korean peninsula and the national power of the country has been demonstrated worldwide even under the tense situation where the imperialist allied forces have become ever-more pronounced in their moves to invade the DPRK. This is the historic miracle brought about by his great Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Filled with the high national pride and honor thanks to the might of Songun, the Korean nation is now waging a nationwide struggle to drive foreign forces out of the country, establish full sovereignty throughout Korea and achieve national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Performs Undying Feats in History of Building Revolutionary Armed Forces All His Life
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Performs Undying Feats in History of Building Revolutionary Armed Forces All His Life
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il visited more than 5 200 units of the Korean People's Army (KPA), performing immortal exploits in the history of building revolutionary armed forces till the last moments of his life since his visit to Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA.
					 He called on the service personnel of the KPA to hold aloft the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the respected Comrade Kim Il Sung!" on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) and bring earlier the final victory of the Korean revolution.
					
					 He visited commanding officers of the KPA on Feb. 18, 1974, the day before the declaration of the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea, and called on them to take the lead in the drive to model the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 He saw to it that the Movement for Winning the Title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment was conducted in the units of the KPA under the uplifted banner of "Let's make the whole army modern-day 7th regiment devotedly defending the headquarters of revolution!"
					
					 He provided tireless field guidance to forefront posts, observation posts, civic police posts and military academies at various levels, flying corps, tank units, naval units and all other units and sub-units of all services and arms.
					
					 He got aboard warships, aircraft and tanks those days to guide service personnel's combat trainings and learn about the combat   performance of weaponry and equipment. He gave instructions on safeguarding the land, seas and sky of the country as firm as an iron wall. 
					
					 He formulated Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism and made long journeys for Songun leadership over units of the KPA in order to weather stern trials in the 1990s and firmly protect the country and socialism. He had given field guidance to more than 2 490 units of armed forces till the last moments of his life since he inspected the Tabaksol Post on January 1, 1995.
					
					 He provided ceaseless field guidance to KPA units to train them to be main forces for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Highly appreciating the revolutionary soldier spirit displayed by the soldier-builders in the construction site of the Anbyon Youth Power Station, he saw to it that the whole country learned from their spirit.
					
					 While inspecting KPA units, he spared time to watch performances given by art squads of KPA units and those of companies, making sure that the new culture in the era of Songun created by the revolutionary army prevailed throughout the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provided Firm Guarantee for Victory of Juche Revolution
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provided Firm Guarantee for Victory of Juche Revolution
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il laid an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the great Paektusan nation by comprehensively establishing the original political mode under socialism, the mode of attaching importance to military affairs and giving priority to them in the 1990s.
					 Since he inspected the Tabaksol (young pine trees) Post of the Korean People's Army, he made over 353 576 km-long forced marches of the Songun revolutionary leadership till the last moments of his life,  firmly defending Juche-based socialism and turning the country into an invincible political, ideological and military power. This was a historic miracle that 
					
					could be performed only by him.
					
					 He put forward the People's Army, the core of military power, as the pillar and main force for the Songun revolution and developed it into an invincible revolutionary army.
					
					 Thanks to his seasoned and tested Songun leadership as an illustrious commander, the most powerful military muscle was built in the briefest span of time despite the harshest ordeals and Songun Korea was turned into an 
					
					invincible military power that can firmly defend socialism.
					
					 It was one of his great exploits shining along with the era of Songun that he turned the country into a politico-ideological power which achieved the single-minded unity.
					
					 The 3rd Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea, which was convened in the crucial turning point of history for the development of the WPK and the revolution, demonstrated the strong spirit of the harmonious whole in which all the service personnel and people achieved the unity in ideology and will and shared their idea, intention and destiny with their leader.
					
					 Kim Jong Il also made a breakthrough in the drive for building a thriving nation by applying the Songun politics to economic construction.
					
					 He made self-sacrificing forced marches to visit work sites for a great surge, racing against time. Thanks his dedication, eye-opening events took place one after another.
					
					 The last three years of his great life during which he made tireless guerilla-style journeys for field guidance after mapping out a great plan to glorify 2012 marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung as an year of proud victory to be specially recorded in the history of building a thriving nation were a review of the popular and heroic life of a legendary great man that the history has never known.
					
					 His Songun revolutionary exploits are displaying their great vitality in the dynamic advance of the new century of Juche where all service personnel and people are hastening the final victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swedish Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Swedish Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Institute for Security and Development Policy of Sweden led by Director Niklas Swanstrom left here for home on Saturday.

articles.title: Spanish Public Figure Leaves
articles.content:
Spanish Public Figure Leaves
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Manuel Garcia Botaya, chief of the Paektusan Group of Spain, left here for home on Saturday.

articles.title: Youth Exhibition of Sci-tech Achievements in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Youth Exhibition of Sci-tech Achievements in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A national youth exhibition of sci-tech achievements is going on at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House here.
					 According to an official concerned, on display there are more than 3 620 inventions and new technological innovation schemes, including 750-odd IT products, made by young scientists and technicians across the country.
					
					 Among them are sci-tech achievements gained in the fields of agriculture and construction.
					
					 What draw visitors' eyes in particular are a technology for baking fire-brick by heat and gas of anthracite without using heavy oil and an impulse-based automatic temperature control system for high-temperature air-combustion heating furnace, presented by Kim Chaek University of Technology. There is also a ray shooting system, presented by the Intelligent Information Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, which has been already introduced to the Meari Shooting Gallery and other units.
					
					 Besides, inventions made in fields of power, railway transport, biology and chemistry are popular among the visitors.
					
					 The exhibition will run till Aug. 26.

articles.title: Release of Detainees Suspected in Case of Attempted Rebellion Demanded
articles.content:
Release of Detainees Suspected in Case of Attempted Rebellion Demanded
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued a statement on August 20 demanding the acquittal of those suspected in the case of the attempted rebellion.
					 In general, the case of the attempted rebellion is a tailored case because the "government" and the Intelligence Service, driven into a tight corner due to the disclosure of the "government" bodies' illegal interference in the election, cooked up it and the court was instructed to make a judgment of it, the statement charged.
					
					 Recalling that the case is linked with the motion calling for the trial for dissolving the Unified Progressive Party, it noted that the "government" has resorted to such moves for eliminating progressive forces as calling for judgment for dissolving the opposition party in a bid to tide over the crisis caused by the election rigging.
					
					 It urged the "government" to set free at once the unreasonably detained people.

articles.title: Stamps Issued to Mark Day of Songun in DPRK
articles.content:
Stamps Issued to Mark Day of Songun in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Stamps (one sheetlet and one individual) were issued in the DPRK to celebrate the Day of Songun (Aug. 25).
					 The army and people in the DPRK significantly mark as the Day of Songun August 25, Juche 49 (1960) when leader Kim Jong Il started his Songun (army-first) revolutionary leadership with inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Printed in the stamps are letters reading "Let us add eternal brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's great idea and achievements of the Songun revolution", "Let us remain true to the great Comrade Kim Jong Un's Songun revolutionary leadership", "Day of Songun" and "August 25". 
					
					 The sheetlet carries a picture of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il rejoicing at the rich diet for servicepersons and a picture of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un inspecting units under the KPA 4th Corps Command.
					
					 The individual stamp features the star of Marshal.

articles.title: Spring Water Supplied to Songrim City of DPRK
articles.content:
Spring Water Supplied to Songrim City of DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- High-quality spring water began to be supplied on a regular basis to the citizens in Songrim City, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK, where the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex is situated.
					 After the discovery of high-quality spring water in a place about 8 km away from the city, its officials took an immediate measure to increase the gush amount of spring and played a leading role in carrying out the project.
					
					 Many citizens volunteered in the project, thus completing it in a short span of time with two filters installed at the spring.
					
					 Now the daily gush amount of the spring is more than tens of tons.
					
					 The spring water is supplied to citizens via 10-odd groceries in the city. Seen in every part of the city are stalls serving the spring water to passersby.

articles.title: FIFA Fitness Course Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
FIFA Fitness Course Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A FIFA Fitness Course was held in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, on Aug. 19-23.
					 Attending the course divided into theoretical and practical sections were coaches and instructors from sports teams and juvenile sports schools across the country.
					
					 The course focused on such matters as players' fitness and role of coaches. What caught the participants' eyes were various methods of physical training in a small ground.
					
					 Kim Chang Hyok, an instructor of Pyongyang International Football School, told KCNA that the course helped him have a good understanding of new fitness methods. I will make the best use of these training methods in the practical education of students, he added.
					
					 The course was officiated by Jones Mark Sean, an Australian lecturer of FIFA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was published in booklet by the Santa Rita Publishing House in Ecuador on Aug. 13.
					 It is the speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade for celebrating the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012). It says that the one hundred year-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the immutable truth that an outstanding leader guarantees the dignity and prosperity of a country and nation.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to eternally exalt the dignity of Songun Korea and successfully accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Russian Papers Observe DPRK's Important Days
articles.content:
Russian Papers Observe DPRK's Important Days
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups on the occasions of the Day of Songun (August 25) and the 61st anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda on August 13 edited several articles illustrated with photos of leader Kim Jong Il inspecting units of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, great brilliant commander in the era of Songun" said:
					
					 August 25 is the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					
					 That day in 1960 Kim Jong Il visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA, an event of great significance.
					
					 He inspected many units of the KPA till the last moments of his life, training it as an invincible army and bolstering up the country's military capability in every way and thereby providing a sure military guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 Grown to be elite forces fully prepared politically and ideologically in strategy and tactics and military technique under his guidance, the KPA has always won victories in confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 The DPRK is proving invincible thanks to single-minded unity, remaining strong with self-defence and achieving prosperity thanks to the industrial revolution in the new century. This eye-opening reality of the DPRK would be unthinkable without the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The 29th issue of Veteran in an article titled "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea, July 27" introduced the army and people of the DPRK who wrought such world historic miracles as defeating the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world for the first time in history, under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It accused the U.S. imperialists of getting frantic with their war exercises for aggression, oblivious of the disgraceful defeat they sustained in the Korean war, and pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Celebrated in Syria
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Celebrated in Syria
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A Syrian preparatory committee for celebrating the 66th anniversary of the DPRK and the 69th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed on Aug. 12.
					 The director for Higher Education of the Regional Leadership of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse celebration and solidarity events on the occasion of the above-said anniversaries.

articles.title: Bulgarian Paper Supports DPRK's Just Cause
articles.content:
Bulgarian Paper Supports DPRK's Just Cause
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The August 1-15th issue of the Bulgarian paper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo carried an article supporting the just cause of the DPRK.
					 The article recalled that the UN Security Council at an informal consultative meeting accused the DPRK of launching short-range missiles in July last, terming it "violation of its resolution", and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released a statement refuting it.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 The military measures taken by the DPRK including the firing of tactical rockets are an exercise of its sovereign right to defend the sovereignty of the country and security of the nation from the U.S. nuclear threat and moves for aggression.
					
					 This year the DPRK made positive peace proposals through the crucial offer and special proposal of its National Defence Commission and the statement of its government and has taken practical measures for their realization.
					
					 However, the U.S., together with the south Korean authorities, staged Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in succession. They conducted the largest-ever joint air battle drills in the wake of their joint landing drills, the largest ones since 1993.
					
					 It is quite natural for the army of the DPRK to make preparations enough to cope with the ever-escalating moves of the U.S. to stifle it by force of arms.
					
					 It is absolutely intolerable that the UNSC overlooks the U.S. bellicose war drills and nuclear threat while taking issue only with the inevitable measures taken by the DPRK for self-defence.
					
					 The UNSC should take issue with the provocative joint military drills of the U.S. and the south Korean warlike forces as it has the mission to ensure world peace and security.
					
					 As long as the UNSC supports the U.S. in its hostile moves against the DPRK, bereft of any impartiality, the DPRK is left with no option but to bolster up its capability for self-defence.

articles.title: British Organizations Term S. Korea U.S. Colony
articles.content:
British Organizations Term S. Korea U.S. Colony 
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- South Korea today is a colony totally dependent on the U.S. and its regime is a puppet one which cannot exercise even its elementary sovereignty.
					 The Korean Friendship Association UK and other progressive organizations in Britain noted this in their joint statement on August 16.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The U.S. has the prerogative of the supreme command over the south Korean army, something hard to see in other parts of the world, and prodded the south Koran puppet group into extending the transfer of the right to control wartime operations beyond 2020.
					
					 It is hard to find any national identity in south Korea as it is pervaded with Yankee-style medley culture. Worship of America reigns in its society.
					
					 South Korean economy is dominated by multinational capital of the U.S.
					
					 South Koreans should launch a dynamic struggle to put an end to the U.S. imperialists' colonial domination.

articles.title: ACNC enumera imborrables proezas de Songun de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
ACNC enumera imborrables proezas de Songun de Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ACNC) -- Se cumple el 54o aniversario del inicio de la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun. 
					 El 25 de agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente visito la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del Ejercito Popular de Corea, lo cual fue un acontecimiento historico que declaro la continuacion de la causa revolucionaria del Songun y la nueva partida de la direccion del Songun. 
					
					 La trayectoria de la direccion revolucionaria del Dirigente es la heroica del gran General Insigne quien defendio con firmeza la patria, la nacion y el socialismo bajo la bandera del Songun. 
					
					 En el proceso de su direccion sobre la revolucion formo y sistematizo la idea revolucionaria del Songun y profundizo y desarrollo este pensamiento que sirve de guia directriz y bandera invencible para el pueblo coreano y los demas revolucionarios del mundo en el cumplimiento de la causa de la independencia. 
					
					 Establecio el sistema de aparatos estatales centrado en la defensa nacional y desarrollo el poder de la RPDC como fuerte arma politica favorable a poner en practica la politica del Songun. 
					
					 Concentro todas las fuerzas en el fortalecimiento del poderio militar y desarrollo el Ejercito Popular como ejercito del lider y del partido. 
					
					 Con la gran decision inimaginable por nadie construyo la industria de defensa nacional independiente y moderna, establecio en toda la sociedad el ambiente de dar importancia a los asuntos militares y realizo en una nueva etapa el armamento de todo pais y la fortificacion de todo el pais, de modo que el pais se convirtiera en una fortaleza inexpugnable. 
					
					 Con su orientacion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun condujo a la victoria el enfrentamiento nuclear antiyanqui y la batalla de defensa del socialismo y defendio la soberania y la dignidad del pais y nacion. 
					
					 Cuando el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos se encontraban en el dilema de triunfar como guardias y pueblo independientes o vivir como  esclavos coloniales del imperialismo, el Dirigente sostuvo mas alto la bandera del Songun y defendio honrosamente el socialismo coreano de tipo jucheano. 
					
					 La direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun permitio defender con firmeza la soberania nacional y sentar la base para lograr la victoria de la causa de la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					 El poderio del Songun frustra paso a paso el intento de los belicistas internos y externos de provocar una nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y asegura la paz del pais y la seguridad de la nacion. 
					
					 El Dirigente frustro con la invicta politica del Songun la brutal campana de aislamiento y aplastamiento anti-RPDC de los imperialistas y protegio el destino de la patria y la nacion. 
					
					 Logro siempre victorias en la confrontacion antiimperialista y antiyanqui y convirtio la RPDC en el digno pais con armas nucleares y la potencia militar de fama mundial. 
					
					 Gracias a la gran orientacion del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, se han preservado firmemente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y se ha manifestado el poderio estatal de la RPDC aunque se tornaban cada dia mas siniestras las maniobras de agresion anti-RPDC de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas. 
					
					 La nacion coreana, enorgullecida por el poderio del Songun, se levanta en la lucha pannacional por expulsar a las fuerzas extranjeras, realizar completamente la soberania en ambito nacional y reunificar la patria.

articles.title: Ocupacion de Sur de Corea por tropas yanquis no puede ser justificada, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ocupacion de Sur de Corea por tropas yanquis no puede ser justificada, destaca Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la nacion coreana no debe tolerar jamas las maniobras de EE.UU. encaminadas a realizar a toda costa la politica hostil anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea justificando la ocupacion del territorio surcoreano por sus tropas, y continua:
					 La ocupacion del territorio surcoreano por las tropas norteamericanas deviene la causa principal de la perturbacion de la paz y la estabilidad en la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Nordeste Asiatico y el acto violador a soberania que pisotea la voluntad y la demanda de la nacion coreana.
					
					 Historicamente, esta ocupacion no es la voluntad y la demanda de la nacion coreana sino el fruto de la politica de hostilidad y agresion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC.
					
					 Despues de la derrota del imperialismo japones, EE.UU. ocupo el territorio surcoreano bajo el pretexto de "desarme del ejercito japones" en la zona al sur del Paralelo 38, con el objetivo de preparar el trampolin militar para apoderarse de la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					 Esto contraviene completamente a los intereses de la nacion coreana.
					
					 Debido a la ocupacion de las tropas norteamericanas los habitantes surcoreanos sufren incontables desgracias y dolores.
					
					 Ahora, EE.UU. actua con frenesi para tomar la heguemonia militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico aunque sufre la grave crisis economica.
					
					 Pero, paso para siempre la epoca en que EE.UU. comete a su antojo la intervencion militar y la agresion a otros paises jactandose de la "unica supremacia".
					
					 La retirada de las tropas norteamericanas del territorio surcoreano debe ser lograda para la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y esta region y para EE.UU.
					
					 Si el imperio sigue tratando de ocupar militarmente el territorio surcoreano le correspondera solo el destino tragico como la ruina completa de las tropas agresivas.

articles.title: Firme garantia de victoria de la revolucion del Juche preparada por Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Firme garantia de victoria de la revolucion del Juche preparada por Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ACNC) -- En la decada de los 90 del siglo pasado, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il establecio globalmente el original modo politico socialista de dar importancia y prioridad a los asuntos militares y sento la eterna base para la prosperidad de la potencia del monte Paektu. 
					 Desde cuando dejo sus nobles huellas en el puesto de pinos hasta el ultimo periodo de su gran vida, el Dirigente estuvo en la marcha forzada recorriendo mas de 883 mil 940 ries (10 ries equivalen a 4 kilometros) para defender con firmeza el socialismo de tipo jucheano y convertir la patria en la potencia ideo-politica y militar sin rival. 
					
					 Este milagro de la historia la pudo crear solo el Dirigente. 
					
					 Ademas, el formo el Ejercito Popular de Corea como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias presentandolo como pilar y grueso de la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					 Gracias a su probada y diestra guia del Songun, se ha preparado la mas poderosa capacidad militar en el mas corto plazo aun en medio de las mas severas pruebas, y la Corea del Songun, siendo potencia militar invicta, pudo defender firmemente el socialismo coreano.
					
					 El Dirigente convirtio la patria en la potencia ideo-politica basada en la unidad monolitica, lo cual es su otra proeza a ser transmitida generacion tras generacion junto con la era del Songun. 
					
					 La III Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corean, convocada en el importante periodo de viraje historico para el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la revolucion coreana, manifesto a todo el mundo el impetu de la unidad monolitica de la Corea del Songun como cuerpo integral unido en lo ideo-volitivo que comparte la ideologia, el proposito y el destino con el dirigente. 
					
					 Al materializar la politica de Songun en la construccion economica, el Dirigente abrio la brecha de la construccion de un Estado prospero. 
					
					 En el proceso de la marcha forzada del Dirigente quien visito incansablemente los campos de construccion en gran auge, sucedieron de modo escalonado los acontecimientos admirables. 
					
					 Durante los ultimos 3 anos de su vida, el estuvo en el camino de visitas de orientacion a la manera de la guerrilla con el gran proposito de hacer brillar el 2012, ano del centesimo aniversario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, como un ano de victorias a ser registrado en letras mayusculas en la historia de construccion de un Estado prospero. Ese lapso fue el balance de toda la vida heroica y popular del gran hombre legendario no visto en la historia humana. 
					
					 Las proezas revolucionarias del Songun del Dirigente manifiestan su gran vitalidad en la gran marcha de la nueva centuria del Juche que adelanta la victoria final bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Cursillo de entrenadores para temple fisico de FIFA
articles.content:
Cursillo de entrenadores para temple fisico de FIFA
 Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 19 al 23 en esta capital el cursillo de entrenadores para el temple fisico de la FIFA con la participacion de los entrenadores de varios conjuntos deportivos y maestros de las escuelas deportivas de jovenes y ninos.
					 En el cursillo que da lecciones teoricas y practicas fueron tratados varios temas como la preparacion fisica de los jugadores, el papel de los entrenadores, la capacidad fisica a ser mantenida por los jugadores de alto nivel, la cantidad del temple fisico.
					
					 Varios metodos que se realizan con pelota en una pequena cancha a diferencia de temples fisicos anteriores, llamaron atencion de los participantes. 
					
					 El maestro de practica de la Escuela Internacional de Futbol de Pyongyang, Kim Chang Hyok, dijo a la ACNC que llego a conocer bien nuevos metodos de temple fisico a traves del presente cursillo y tomo su decision de materializar en la educacion de practica de los alumnos.
					
					 El cursillo estuvo a cargo del lector australiano de la FIFA, Jones Mark Sean.
